name: index.js
description: Advanced string manipulation utilities with immutable operations and chainable transformations. Features include case conversion, trimming, pattern matching, and string interpolation.

features.description: Immutable string wrapper with chainable operations

examples.caption: Basic String Operations
examples.code:
import { MagicString } from 'xajs/lang'
const str = MagicString('  hello world  ')
// Chain multiple operations
const result = str
.trim()
.capitalize()
.replace(/world/, 'AJS')
console.log(result)  // 'Hello AJS'
console.log(str)     // Original string unchanged

examples.caption: Advanced Pattern Matching
String Transformation

MagicString.name: MagicString
